title: Are there military in Azerbaijan? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, Azerbaijan do have a defence army force. It's not a big army relatively, however it's a small force to defend the country and it's leadership. The Armed Forces of Azerbaijan were restablished after the Soviet Union was shattered to pieces. Azerbaijan created its Armed Forces from October 1991. Defence Minister: Colonel-General Zakir Hasanov Budget: 2.805 billion USD. Active personnel: 125,000
Are there military in Azerbaijan? All countries have a Military except Grenada The Country with No Army!
